modName: Xena The Warrior Princess - Standalone Follower Mod (PACK)
summary: A little mod I've been working on. This adds my three standalone followers from Xena: The Warrior Princess. They are Xena, Gabrielle and Callisto. They can be found inside the Sleeping Giant Inn.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]﻿
[img]https://i.imgur.com/L8qGbCd.png[/img][/size]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img]

[size=3][i]A few days ago, I received a request to make Callisto, the archinemesis of Xena. Then I thought why not try to make Xena and Gabrielle as well? So I did. I'll try to make a single ESP containing all in one, but in the meantime you can download they three one by one.[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84105/]
[/url]
[u]You can add screenshots! I'll be waiting yours.

[/u][/i][i][u][img]http://image.prntscr.com/image/8b4cece25815466abda6ca557ba9c853.png[/img]
[/u][/i][/size]
[color=#ff0000]*Note:[/color] English is not my native language, I'll do my best to explain you all about this mod.
[size=6]
► [color=#8e7cc3]INFORMATION [/color]◄[/size]
[i][img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/i]

[i][size=3]This mods adds my three standalone followers: Xena, Gabrielle and Callisto, from the TV show Xena: The Warrior Princess.[/size][/i]
[i]
[size=5]XENA[/size]

[size=3]Name: Xena[/size]
[size=3]Hair Color: Black[/size]
[size=3]Eye Color: Light Blue[/size]
[size=3]Essential: Yes[/size]
[size=3]Level: Levels with PC[/size]
[size=3]Combat Style: One-Handed[/size]
[size=3]Armor: Companions Armor[/size]
[size=3]Body - UNP
Additional Info: She has some powerful perks focused on melee combat skills. Her weapon is an elven sword.

[i][size=5]GABRIELLE[/size]

[size=3]Name: Gabrielle[/size]
[size=3]Hair Color: Blonde[/size]
[size=3]Eye Color: Dark Blue[/size]
[size=3]Essential: Yes[/size]
[size=3]Level: Levels with PC[/size]
[size=3]Combat Style: Scout[/size]
[size=3]Armor: Hide Armor[/size]
[size=3]Body - UNP
[i][size=3]Additional Info: She has some powerful perks focused on healing and some sneaky skills. Her weapon is a steel mace.[/size][/i][/size][/i]

[i][size=5]CALLISTO[/size]

[size=3]Name: [/size]
[size=3]Hair Color: Light Blonde[/size]
[size=3]Eye Color: Brown[/size]
[size=3]Essential: Yes[/size]
[size=3]Level: Levels with PC[/size]
[size=3]Combat Style: Rogue[/size]
[size=3]Armor: Scaled Armor[/size]
[size=3]Body - UNP
[i][size=3]Additional Info: She has some powerful perks focused on sneaky combat skills. Her weapon is a orcish dagger.[/size][/i][/size][/i][/size][/i][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][i][size=3]
[/size][/i]


[img]https://i.imgur.com/reelO1T.png[/img]
[i][img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/i]
They can be found inside the Sleeping Giant Inn (Riverwood), ready to follow you.
﻿﻿
[img]https://i.imgur.com/qojI4aL.jpg[/img]﻿
﻿
[i][size=4]** Sleeping Giant Inn (Riverwood) **
[/size][/i]
[i][img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img][/i]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/aQdbGCp.png[/img]
[size=3][img]https://i.imgur.com/Yho1OyI.png[/img]
[/size]
[i][i]Kalilies[/i] for the hair.
LogRaam for the eyes.
Hvergelmir for the brows
Bethesda for making this fantastic game.[/i]
[i]Nexus Community for making me possible to share this mod.

[size=5]Check out my other mods & screenshots!
